rows.label: bf06300100_0010
rows.name: Okay, that should do it.

rows.label: bf06300100_0020
rows.name: Preparations complete!

rows.label: bf06300100_0030
rows.name: What's going on? Tora?

rows.label: bf06300100_0040
rows.name:
Oho-ho!
Both Drivers and Blades...

rows.label: bf06300100_0050
rows.name: use ether energy to deploy Arts, yes?

rows.label: bf06300100_0060
rows.name:
You can skip the lecture, Tora.
Everyone knows that.

rows.label: bf06300100_0070
rows.name: But right now friends cannot, yes?

rows.label: bf06300100_0080
rows.name: Yeah, there's something about this room...

rows.label: bf06300100_0090
rows.name:
Oho-ho-ho! But Rex-Rex and friends
forgetting one very important thing!

rows.label: bf06300100_0100
rows.name: Hurry up, would you? Just spit it out, furball!

rows.label: bf06300100_0110
rows.name:
Could be friends forgetting,
Hana is artificial Blade?

rows.label: bf06300100_0120
rows.name:
Why would we forget that?
She's been with us all this time...

rows.label: bf06300100_0130
rows.name:
...Wait! I get it!
Her ether furnace!

rows.label: bf06300100_0140
rows.name: Rex correct.

rows.label: bf06300100_0150
rows.name:
Thanks to friend Meleph, Hana now able
to generate own supply of ether energy.

rows.label: bf06300100_0160
rows.name: Nothing barrier can do anything about.

rows.label: bf06300100_0170
rows.name:
Tora transfer crystal from sword
of Meleph to Biter of Hana.

rows.label: bf06300100_0180
rows.name:
That crystal have enough energy
stored for one use of Arts.

rows.label: bf06300100_0190
rows.name: And Biter of Hana use Earth element.

rows.label: bf06300100_0200
rows.name:
So through synergy with Fire element
of Meleph, power of Arts is amplified!

rows.label: bf06300100_0210
rows.name:
If we hit it straight on,
I doubt the door can withstand that.

rows.label: bf06300100_0220
rows.name:
Wait a minute...
You stored energy in that crystal?

rows.label: bf06300100_0230
rows.name: How is that possible with a barrier...?

rows.label: bf06300100_0240
rows.name: Aha!

rows.label: bf06300100_0250
rows.name:
Meleph-sama has not used a single Art
since we arrived in this place!

rows.label: bf06300100_0260
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] Wha-?!

rows.label: bf06300100_0270
rows.name: I had my suspicions ever since we entered the palace.

rows.label: bf06300100_0280
rows.name:
So I secretly asked Tora to refrain
from using any Arts either.

rows.label: bf06300100_0290
rows.name: Oho-ho-ho!

rows.label: bf06300100_0300
rows.name: I see now.

rows.label: bf06300100_0310
rows.name:
If our enemies knew Hana retains her power inside
the barrier, they would keep us on a tighter leash.

rows.label: bf06300100_0320
rows.name:
Exactly.
Here goes. Step back.

rows.label: bf06300100_0330
rows.name: Hold up!

rows.label: bf06300100_0340
rows.name:
If you transferred the crystal from the sword,
what will you fight with?

rows.label: bf06300100_0350
rows.name: I can generate a new one from Kagutsuchi's core.

rows.label: bf06300100_0360
rows.name:
...?
Don't tell me you didn't know about that.

rows.label: bf06300100_0370
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] Whoa...

rows.label: bf06300100_0380
rows.name:
Seriously? You don't even know
how Blade weapons work? Give me a break.

rows.label: bf06300100_0390
rows.name: How...would I know something like that?!

rows.label: bf06300100_0400
rows.name: I've never lost or broken my weapon!

rows.label: bf06300100_0410
rows.name: Then I suppose I cannot blame you.

rows.label: bf06300100_0420
rows.name:
Moving along, then...
Tora, Hana, please?

rows.label: bf06300100_0430
rows.name: With pleasure!

rows.label: bf06300100_0440
rows.name: Hana power!

rows.label: bf06300100_0450
rows.name: Jeeeeet Biter!!!

rows.label: bf06300100_0460
rows.name: We did it!

rows.label: bf06300100_0470
rows.name: We the best!

rows.label: bf06300100_0480
rows.name:
You made quite some noise, too.
It won't be long before the guards arrive!

rows.label: bf06300100_0490
rows.name: Good point!

rows.label: bf06300100_0500
rows.name:
Homura-sama was taken below.
Mayhap somewhere beneath the palace?

rows.label: bf06300100_0510
rows.name: Got it!
